沿革內容:
1.Promulgated on May 21, 2003.
  Passed at the Ninth Meeting of the Third Session, the Fifth Assembly of the Legislative Yuan, on April 29, 2003

法規內容.條文內容: This Act is specifically enacted for the promotion of national oral health. For matters not regulated in this Act, the regulations of other laws will be applied.

The competent authorities mentioned in this Act shall be the Department of Health of the Executive Yuan at the central level; the municipality governments at the municipality level; and the county/city governments at the county or city level.
The competent authorities should prepare budget every year for the implementation of programs related to oral health promotion.
The competent authorities should strengthen the prevention and control on the risk factors of oral health, as well as dissemination of the knowledge about this issue.

The competent education authorities should enhance the promotion of
school-based oral health education.

While the competent authorities and the competent education authorities conduct oral health education programs, all organizations, schools, groups, and mass media concerned should comply with these authorities accordingly.

The competent authorities should prepare budget for survey and research on oral health-related issues; organizations concerned, schools, or professional groups relevant to oral health may be commissioned or subsidized to conduct them.

Municipality, county, and city governments should appoint a full-time person, and the central competent authorities should establish a unit, to be fully responsible for the implementation of matters concerning oral health.
This Act shall be implemented on the day of announcement.
